description: Structured information describing the electrical contact of an electrode.

contactPoint._instruction: Add the central coordinate of this electrode contact.

definedIn._instruction: Add one or several files in which the electrode contact is defined in.

internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier used for this electrode contact within the file it is stored in.

relatedRecordings._instruction: Add one or several files in which the recordings from this electrode contact were stored.

relatedStimulations._instruction: Add one or several files in which the stimulations applied via this electrode contact were stored.

visualizedIn._instruction: Add one or several images in which the electrode contact is visualized in.
